extendedInfo.description: LEARN TO CONTROL THE STRESS THAT CONTRIBUTES TO DEPRESSIONCONTAINS***Screening test with graph to monitor severity of depressed mood***Articles about clinical depression and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)***50 suggestions from CBT with a tracking feature to help focus positively and motivate***Depression Assistance Audio to help understand clinical depression***Cognitive Thought Diary to learn to challenge stressful thinking and provide positive feedback***Emotion Training Audio to learn to access calming moods or emotions***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation***Password protection available***Customization of graphicsNOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.comThe natural management of depression involves understanding depression and the factors that contribute to the symptoms. Learning to manage stress in your life and engage in self-care behaviors can improve your symptoms and your mood.This app contains a depression severity test, audios, articles, a cognitive diary, and a motivational points system that help you learn how to do this.Reason for permissions:1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audiosMotivational rewards now available!***Sign-up for AchieveMint.com and earn points to redeem for cash whenever you engage in the self-improvement activities in this app.***This is an advertiser-sponsored program but you have control over whether you want to participate and you get paid for participating.

reviews.title: A big help
reviews.comment: I really am enjoying this app. It is helping me to think through so much, and it makes me feel better every day. I\'m using it in conjunction with a few of the other apps by the same person. I\'m a happier person each day that passes! Thank you.
reviews.author: Alicia Buerkle

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you. This app really helps me to work though what is going on for me. My therapist taught me CBT and now I can practice it anywhere and any time. Thank you.
reviews.author: Alicia M

reviews.comment: Very good tools and a lot of information and suggestions if you are really trying to help yourself. Very eye opening yet I think I already knew these things but was in denial. Well better days are to come. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So helpful! Gets u out of ur head and slows down automatic thought processes and encourages u to challenge thinking
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app, poor interface.
reviews.comment: I really like using this, but the interface can sometimes get confusing. It\'s bulky and crowded, but if you can get past that it\'s very helpful and useful.
reviews.author: Jill-Muad\'Dib Springer

reviews.title: Practical and Easy to Use!
reviews.comment: Best app ever! Very easy to use and so helpful. Just what I needed. Highly recommend!!
reviews.author: Shauna M

reviews.title: very useful and helpful
reviews.comment: The testing and suggestions help me alot and i love the inspirational quotes. It would be nice though if it had a list of doctors or people to contact that could help me.
reviews.author: Indigo Green

reviews.title: Great Free Depression App
reviews.comment: For a free app that provides cbt logs, meditation, relaxation training, the ability to track some of you depression symptoms & provide suggestions to get you upband moving - it\'s a well  designed little app.
reviews.author: M McDermott

reviews.title: So helpful!
reviews.comment: My grandfather died a few months ago, and it\'s been really hard on me.  He was like a father figure to me.  I also recently turned 21, and got into alcohol pretty bad.  I dont have the time or the money for a therapist.  I was skeptical at first because its just an app, but I was pleasantly surprised.  I feel like got a therapist for free kinda.  I\'m still depressed, but the days are getting easier as I put forth more effort into this.  Thanks, you just might have saved my life.
reviews.author: Samantha Lanting

reviews.title: Just wow.
reviews.comment: I am in shock.  I downloaded this app and immediately went to check it out.  I first listened  to a relaxation audio, then I listened to the Depression Assistance audio.  I am completely stunned.   I would swear the speaker was speaking directly to me.  Every single thing she said had me nodding in agreement.  I am excited to tell my therapist about this app as well as looking into what else it has to offer.  And for me to say \"I am excited\" about anything is a huge step.
reviews.author: Kit Moore

reviews.title: Trying it out
reviews.comment: Hope this works looking for some kinda help manage it a lil more  thanks. Google play for the help
reviews.author: Aj Bowen

reviews.title: Saving me from dark moments
reviews.comment: When all seems lost I open this app and take some time to read an article, fill a diary entry and listen to an audio. By the time I\'m done life is a little brighter and the world doesn\'t seem so harsh. Thank you for guiding me through the darkness.
reviews.author: Kara Matters

reviews.comment: Helps me feel better.
reviews.author: Marga D

reviews.title: Good reminder!
reviews.comment: Great articles and a good daily reminder to evaluate negative thinking and try to turn it around.
reviews.author: Summer Saraf

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: It\'s a shame I\'m too depressed to type all the info they require in some test.
reviews.author: Hiram Beniquez

reviews.comment: I thoroughly enjoy this app! I noticed an improvement in my mood, stress, and Outlook on life in just three days. Give it a chance :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This app, along with others by excel at life, is a really useful tool for beating depression. Downloading it has been a real turning point for me. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Claire Stammars

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Thank you so much. May God bless you.
reviews.author: Ria V

reviews.title: Phenomenal.
reviews.comment: Gives you a tool to take concrete action towards mental state.
reviews.author: Timothy Walker

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: They are all so exactly what.I was hoping they would be.
reviews.author: Leslie Pierce
